alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 12:40PM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Kern River Valley, Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
